name: Caffeine Fueled
description:
Caffeine Fueled is a retro-inspired side-scroller game where you take control of a guy with a coffee-powered jetpack and try to dodge the evil copter kids and other random stuff flying in the sky. Be careful not to run out of fuel lest you fall from the sky! Uh-oh! 

Aside from the gameplay, the game also features a shop mechanic where you can buy cosmetic hats and pets. 

This game is an entry for the Pygame Community New Years Jam, which can be found here: itch.io/jam/pygame-community-jam

If you are a developer and want to look at the source code, the game's repository can be found here: github.com/zyenapz/Caffeine-Fueled

I hope you enjoy the game and tell me what you think :D

CREDITS

Font is called "Press Start" by Codeman38 and was downloaded from Google Fonts.

Music was made by this person, check out their page: soundcloud.com/electrobaptist/happybeat-8bit-retro-game-loop

FAQ

Q. The game doesn't run, what should I do?

A. Check if the 'data' folder is extracted or that your antivirus software isn't interfering with the execution of the program.
